required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Follitropin Delta in Long GnRH Agonist and GnRH Antagonist Protocols (BEYOND)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Controlled, Open Label, Parallel Group, Multicentre Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Individualised FE 999049 (Follitropin Delta) Dosing, Using a Long GnRH Agonist Protocol and a GnRH Antagonist Protocol in Women Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Stimulation

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the efficacy and safety of FE 999049 (follitropin delta) and its personalized dosing algorithm in controlled ovarian stimulation for in vitro fertilization (IVF)/intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI) using a long gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH) agonist protocol versus a short GnRH antagonist protocol.

primary_outcome.time_frame: On day of oocyte retrieval (up to 22 days after start of stimulation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with cycle cancellation due to poor ovarian response or excessive ovarian response
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At end-of-stimulation (up to 20 days)
secondary_outcome.description: For each subject, the reason for cycle cancellation will be recorded

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with blastocyst transfer cancellation after oocyte retrieval due to (risk of) ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome (OHSS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At end of transfer (up to 4 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: For each subject, the reason for blastocyst transfer cancellation will be recorded

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On stimulation day 6 and at end-of-stimulation (up to 20 days)
secondary_outcome.description: The total number of follicles and the number of follicles per size category will be reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with <4, 4-7, 8-14, 15-19 and ≥20 oocytes retrieved
secondary_outcome.time_frame: On day of oocyte retrieval (up to 22 days after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Grouped according to number of oocytes

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On day of oocyte retrieval (up to 22 days after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Only applicable for those inseminated using ICSI

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On day 1 after oocyte retrieval (up to 23 days after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Measured by the number of pronuclei. Fertilized oocytes with 2 pronuclei will be regarded as correctly fertilized

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On day 3 after oocyte retrieval (up to 25 days after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of embryos (total and good-quality) will be reported. Embryo quality is determined by combined assesment of cleavage stage (number of blastomeres/compaction status) and embryo morphology parameters

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On day 5 after oocyte retrieval (up to 27 days after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of blastocysts (total and good-quality) will be reported. Blastocyst quality is assessed by blastocyst expansion and hatching status, blastocyst inner cell mass grading, and trophectoderm grading. The scoring is based on the classification system by Gardner and Schoolcraft, with additional categories for inner cell mass (degenerative or no inner cell mass) and trophectoderm (degenerative or very large cells)

secondary_outcome.measure: Circulating concentrations of follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH), luteinizing hormone (LH), estradiol, progesterone and inhibin B
secondary_outcome.time_frame: On stimulation day 6, at end-of-stimulation (up to 20 days after start of stimulation) and at oocyte retrieval (up to 22 days after start of stimulation)
Up to 20 days
secondary_outcome.description: Calculated by start dates, end dates and daily dose of investigational medicinal product

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 20 days
secondary_outcome.description: Calculated by start dates and end dates

secondary_outcome.measure: Positive beta human chorionic gonadotropin (βhCG) rate
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 13-15 days after transfer (up to approximately 1.5 months after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as positive serum βhCG test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5-6 weeks after transfer (up to approximately 2.5 months after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as the number of gestational sacs after transfer divided by number of blastocysts transferred

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5-6 weeks after transfer (up to approximately 2.5 months after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as at least one gestational sac

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 5-6 weeks after transfer (up to approximately 2.5 months after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as at least one intrauterine gestational sac with fetal heart beat

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10-11 weeks after transfer (up to approximately 4 months after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: At least one intrauterine viable fetus

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10-11 weeks after transfer (up to approximately 4 months after start of stimulation)
secondary_outcome.description: Defined as number of intrauterine viable fetuses divided by the number of blastocysts transferred

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with early OHSS (including OHSS of moderate/severe grade)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 9 days after triggering of final follicular maturation
secondary_outcome.description: Measured as mild, moderate or severe

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with late OHSS (including OHSS of moderate/severe grade)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: >9 days after triggering of final follicular maturation
secondary_outcome.description: Measured as mild, moderate or severe

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From time of signing informed consent until the end-of-trial (approximately 7 months)
secondary_outcome.description: Any untoward medical occurrence

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From time of signing informed consent until the end-of-trial (approximately 7 months)
secondary_outcome.description: Categorized as mild, moderate or severe

secondary_outcome.measure: Technical malfunctions of the pre-filled injection pen
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 20 days
secondary_outcome.description: Incidences of technical malfunctions of the pre-filled injection pen will be recorded

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Infertile women aged 18-40 undergoing their first IVF/ICSI cycle that are in good physical and mental health and that have been diagnosed with problems in the fallopian tubes, mild endometriosis or have partners with decreased sperm quality.
- The participants must have a regular menstrual cycle, a normal uterus and 2 normal ovaries.
- The allowed body mass index is 17.5-32 Kg/m^2.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women with very high ovarian reserve, strong preference for either treatment, severe endometriosis, history of repeated miscarriage, couples with known problems in the chromosomes, history or high risk of producing blood cloths, women known to have chronic diseases, women recently participating in trials with non-registered drugs.

eligibility.gender_description: Women undergoing their first IVF/ICSI cycle and aged 18-40 years will be included.

facility.name: Dipartimento della Donna, del bambino e delle malattie urologiche
